PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In film , the absorption of PSFDTBT became broader and slightly redshifted with two peaks located at 401 and 562 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| absorption of PSFDTBT     |
| became broader           |
| slightly redshifted      |
| two peaks                |
| located at 401 nm        |
| located at 562 nm        |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| absorption of PSFDTBT     |
| became broader           |
| slightly redshifted      |
| two peaks                |
| located at 401 nm        |
| located at 562 nm        |

Note: In this context, "absorption" is a material property. "Became broader" and "slightly redshifted" describe changes in the absorption property. "Two peaks" and "located at 401 nm" and "located at 562 nm" describe specific values of the absorption property.
